title: Fps Lag
body: On Oct. 24th 2016 I downloaded the latest patch and i had massive fps lag in game. I have a computer that can run it at 300fps 49sm.s. i had this problen about a year ago and it lastest 3 months because there was no patcj fixing it. Please look into this so im not stuck with this for months..

replies.body:
Did you try to desaible the win10 (ONLY!) xbox game record thing ? 
> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=O89HAMWi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-28T15:39:07.673+0000)
>
> FPS issues like this can be caused by outdated drivers, so updating them was a solid step.  There may be other factors as well, like hardware or bad game files.  There's also been a recent Windows 10 update that auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html), which has been causing fps issues for some players.  Disabling that may the issue fixed!
> 
> Otherwise, check out each step in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to get that fixed up, and to make sure that your files are tuned up to play.  Let me know if you have any questions!
I tried everything on the list and nothing worked. I had this problem about 7 months ago around the same time there was a new patch it was a top reddit thread for a while. Any other ideas???
Ill check out the fos trouble shoot guide and get back to you.

FPS issues can often be caused by issues with your system drivers or hardware. Check in with our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for some steps that should help you resolve this.

Let me know if you continue to have issues with this.

I've checked several times with my ISP, my connections, my router, cords everything. But ever since the latest patch i get a weird type of lag, in intervals, throughout the game.  Specifically at time stamps between 7:03-7:26, 22:08-24:14, 32:12-35:46 and 41:13-46:43. These are the time stamps where i notice it most. I have asked several other players and they tell me they get the same issue around the same times. Spells and and animations seem to go out of sync, such as MF ult, or a dragon's death.  I've only noticed this after the latest patch, and wonder if there is some issue with Riot servers. it's not completely game ruining, but makes playing most champion's extremely difficult and hitting minions almost impossible. Do you have any information that might lead to a discovery regarding my issue?
